Returns a pointer to the object pointed to by the wrapped pointer-like object, {{tt|t_}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
If {{tt|T}} is an object pointer type, then {{c|t_}}. Otherwise, {{c|t_.get()}}.
